phrs.translation: 抽吸机；吸尘机；吸痰器；气吸式捡拾机
吸起泵；吸入压力；吸入泵
吸引高度；吸入水头，负压水头

sentences.sentence: Michael was showing the nurse how to suction his saliva.
sentences.translation: 迈可正演示给护士看如何吸出他的唾液。

sentences.sentence: Dust bags act as a filter and suction will be reduced if they are too full.
sentences.translation: 灰尘袋是一个过滤器，一旦太满吸力就会减弱。

sentences.sentence: It was only when the hull was hanging freely from the lifting frame, clear of the seabed and the suction effect of the surrounding mud, that the salvage operation progressed to the second stage.
sentences.translation: 只有当船体从升降架上自由悬挂，脱离海床和周围泥浆的吸力作用时，打捞工作才进入第二阶段。
